title: fragment:scp-7943-1
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= 7943
|clearance= 2
|container-class= safe
|secondary-class= none
|disruption-class= dark
|risk-class= caution

[[include :scp-wiki:component:acs-animation]]

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-7943 is to be contained in a standard safe-class inanimate object locker, with the addition of radiation-proof lead lining. Further testing is forbidden by order of Site Director Meyer. _

**Description:** SCP-7943 is a solid cube 46 cm in width with numerous minor anomalous properties. Any attempt to test for a new property is likely to cause it to manifest a new property to ensure that the test returns a positive result. It is expected to remain static and harmless if no further testing is performed. The only current safety concern is that it emits ionizing radiation.  _

**Personal Note:** //"Leave this one alone. It's for the best."// - Dr. Mendoza  _
